pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-oauth2======================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/stormsherpa/django-oauth2-provider.png?branch=master*django-oauth2* is a Django application that providescustomizable OAuth2\-authentication for your Django projects.`Documentation <https://new-django-oauth2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`_License=======*django-oauth2* is a fork of *django-oauth2-provider* which is released under the MIT License. Please see the LICENSE file for details.
